message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you is $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to pay that price for the product, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16000. I think it's a fair compromise considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. Can you consider that price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more offer to try to meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $16500. It's a bit above your original offer, but I think it's a fair compromise considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
